video.title: Murdoch Mysteries
video.synopsis: In Victorian-era Toronto, Inspector William Murdoch uses unconventional scientific methods to crack complex, high-profile murder cases.

episodes.synopsis: While demonstrating a current to the public, Miss Toronto Electric & Light dies onstage. Detective William Murdoch enlists the help of Nikola Tesla.
episodes.title: Power

episodes.synopsis: A trunk delivered contains a naked corpse and a taunting note. Murdoch races to find the killer before his boss becomes the next victim.
episodes.title: The Glass Ceiling

episodes.synopsis: After a big win, a boxer goes down, courtesy of a gunshot. A witness finds his wife, standing over the body; Murdoch aims to prove her innocence.
episodes.title: The Knockdown

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch accompanies his hero to a séance. Did the clues indeed come from the spirit world? Or did the medium have a motive for murder?
episodes.title: Elementary, My Dear Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: When a man dies, the case looks like a simple robbery gone wrong. But questions about his ways lead Murdoch into Toronto's homosexual subculture.
episodes.title: Till Death Do Us Part

episodes.synopsis: A murder brings Murdoch face to face with his past, as the detective's estranged father turns up drunk near the crime scene.
episodes.title: Let Loose the Dogs

episodes.synopsis: When a corpse crashes through a ceiling and lands onstage, Murdoch and Brackenreid delve into the intrigues of the city's Shakespearean acting troupe.
episodes.title: Body Double

episodes.synopsis: Boys playing on the lakeshore discover the beaten body of a scion of a wealthy family. Murdoch finds secrets beneath a gleaming world of privilege.
episodes.title: Still Waters

episodes.synopsis: Arthur Conan Doyle meddles in a case involving a ventriloquist who seems to have murdered his father. Murdoch begins to suspect a hidden agenda.
episodes.title: Belly Speaker

episodes.synopsis: Who could have murdered Howard Rookwood? When suspicions fall on employees, Murdoch uncovers another side to the victim's character.
episodes.title: Child's Play

episodes.synopsis: After a mysterious hooded figure kills a prominent psychiatric researcher, Murdoch investigates the doctor's former patients.
episodes.title: Bad Medicine

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a girl leads police to suspect a plot against a visiting prince. Constable Crabtree finds His Highness more than a handful to guard.
episodes.title: The Rebel and the Prince

episodes.synopsis: When an astronomer is found hanging in a tree, evidence points to one conclusion: Martians. Murdoch searches for more earthly answers.
episodes.title: The Annoying Red Planet

episodes.synopsis: When a stunt goes wrong at Buffalo Bill's Wild West Extravaganza, it's up to Murdoch to decide whether the shooting was murder or a tragic accident.
episodes.title: Mild, Mild West

episodes.synopsis: A Scotland Yard detective arrives in Toronto convinced that Jack the Ripper is within his grasp. Murdoch races against time to catch the killer.
episodes.title: Snakes and Ladders

episodes.synopsis: A famed paleontologist is in town to premiere his new discovery, but Murdoch's evening with Dr. Ogden is ruined when the event becomes a crime scene.
episodes.title: Dinosaur Fever

episodes.synopsis: A bank robbery and two murders seem to implicate Harry Houdini. His assistant, who's also Dr. Ogden's sister, believes the illusionist is innocent.
episodes.title: Houdini Whodunit

episodes.synopsis: An "experiment" with absinthe after the murder of an escort finally brings Ogden and Murdoch together. The Temperance League increases its pressure.
episodes.title: The Green Muse

episodes.synopsis: When a woman is found dead in a creek, Murdoch investigates a man from Dr. Ogden's past. Their relationship is threatened by differences of opinion.
episodes.title: Shades of Grey

episodes.synopsis: At first glance, a physics professor's murder seems to be the perfect crime. Murdoch needs Dr. Ogden's help, but their relationship remains strained.
episodes.title: Big Murderer on Campus

episodes.synopsis: A young boy comes to the station with a strange report about a giant knight, but Murdoch brushes it off as a tall tale. Then the boy goes missing.
episodes.title: I, Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch, injured while pursuing a suspect, is bedridden with two women competing for his affections: Dr. Ogden and Enid, a beautiful young widow.
episodes.title: Convalescence

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch's relationship with Enid continues to grow. When a mysterious killer begins stalking telegraph operators in Toronto, he calls on her for help.
episodes.title: Murdoch.com

episodes.synopsis: The death of a factory worker in Toronto's insular Jewish ward reveals his star-crossed romance with the wealthy factory owner's daughter.
episodes.title: Let Us Ask the Maiden

episodes.synopsis: A savage killing -- seemingly committed by an animal -- has some people convinced a werewolf is on the prowl. Murdoch seeks a logical explanation.
episodes.title: Werewolves

episodes.synopsis: An investigation is alternately thwarted and aided by a mounted policeman who otherwise seems competent and meticulous, much to Murdoch's irritation.
episodes.title: Anything You Can Do

episodes.synopsis: A dazed Murdoch wakes in Bristol with no memory of who he is or how he got there. And it seems he's wanted by British intelligence agents for murder.
episodes.title: The Murdoch Identity

episodes.synopsis: When a policeman is murdered in Chinatown, the force wants to pin the blame on an elderly immigrant, but Murdoch isn't sure they have the right man.
episodes.title: The Great Wall

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch and the team are introduced to the complex underworld of Toronto's secret societies after a man dies at a Masonic initiation ritual.
episodes.title: Victor, Victorian

episodes.synopsis: A tranquil day in the park turns sinister when Inspector Brackenreid's son is abducted. But the kidnappers may have made a dangerous error.
episodes.title: Rich Boy, Poor Boy

episodes.synopsis: A local farmer's found with an axe in his chest, and his blood-soaked daughter confesses to the crime. But Murdoch believes deeper issues are at play.
episodes.title: Me, Myself and Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: Wealthy James Pendrick enlists the force to guard his priceless Rembrandt, but an audacious thief manages to steal it, killing a man along the way.
episodes.title: This One Goes to Eleven

episodes.synopsis: An out-of-control tiger in a traveling circus kills its trainer before escaping. Murdoch suspects the case is more complicated than it appears.
episodes.title: Blood and Circuses

episodes.synopsis: Writer H.G. Wells is the guest of honor at a secret meeting of the Toronto Society for the Advancement of Eugenics, to which Murdoch's invited.
episodes.title: Future Imperfect

episodes.synopsis: Bridge builders at the Don River discover the mummified bodies of a man and a woman. Murdoch and Ogden ascertain that the pair was murdered.
episodes.title: Love and Human Remains

episodes.synopsis: When a second heir to the Beaton fortune dies in unusual circumstances, Murdoch questions the staff at Beaton Manor, who talk of a malevolent ghost.
episodes.title: The Curse of Beaton Manor

episodes.synopsis: While Dr. Ogden examines a suspicious mark on the body of the recently hanged Cecil Fox, the man suddenly wakes, knocks her unconscious and flees.
episodes.title: Hangman

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch delves into the scandalous world of Victorian erotica after a young woman who posed for a series of saucy pictures is murdered.
episodes.title: In the Altogether

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch's friend Nikola Tesla appears on the scene of a bizarre murder saying his latest invention's been stolen. Dr. Odgen consider a career change.
episodes.title: The Tesla Effect

episodes.synopsis: Prickly new pathologist Dr. Llewllyn Francis clashes with Murdoch over a puzzling case involving dismembered body parts encased in concrete blocks.
episodes.title: All Tattered and Torn

episodes.synopsis: A dead soldier found hanging from a tree leads Murdoch to a secret plot involving the Canadian military and puts him at odds with British forces.
episodes.title: Kommando

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch reunites with Dr. Ogden in Buffalo when she asks for help investigating an unsettling case. In Toronto, a break-in raises questions.
episodes.title: Buffalo Shuffle

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy patriarch is found dead, Murdoch is thrust into a world of privilege and resentment, forcing him to untangle a twisted web of motives.
episodes.title: Downstairs, Upstairs

episodes.synopsis: A French woman's disappearance forces Murdoch to partner with Detective Marcel Guillaume, a real-life inspiration for the fictional Inspector Maigret.
episodes.title: Monsieur Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch suspects that a detailed miniature streetscape contains clues to a murder but he faces unusual challenges when trying to collect evidence.
episodes.title: Dead End Street

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch's investigation of a defense minister's murder infuriates the detective's rival and sparks hostilities between Canada and the United States.
episodes.title: Confederate Treasure

episodes.synopsis: A wannabe sleuth who has tested Murdoch's patience with false reports claims that she overheard a murder, inspiring Murdoch to tap the phone system.
episodes.title: Dial M for Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: While pursuing a case involving an old flame, Murdoch runs afoul of mobsters who will stop at nothing to silence anyone connected with their target.
episodes.title: The Black Hand

episodes.synopsis: Religion and murder mix uneasily when a priest's corpse is found in a convent led by someone connected to Murdoch, who finds his beliefs tested.
episodes.title: Voices

episodes.synopsis: When a vampire craze consumes Toronto thanks to Bram Stoker's "Dracula," Murdoch must wade through public hysteria to apprehend a fanged killer.
episodes.title: Bloodlust

episodes.synopsis: Paddy Glynn's sensational reporting complicates Murdoch's work when he pursues a dashing masked robber who steals from banks and gives to the poor.
episodes.title: The Kissing Bandit

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch steps through the looking glass when he becomes the prime suspect in a murder committed during an "Alice in Wonderland" costume party.
episodes.title: Murdoch in Wonderland

episodes.synopsis: Detective William Murdoch leaves Toronto for the Klondike Gold Rush in the Yukon, intent on a life beyond policing. There he meets writer Jack London and stumbles upon a murder investigation.
episodes.title: Murdoch of the Klondike

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch (Yannick Bisson) must tread carefully when he pursues a Catholic suspect in the murder of an Alderman, killed during the attempted assassination of the city's Protestant Mayor.
episodes.title: Back and to the Left

episodes.synopsis: When Detective Murdoch (Yannick Bisson) investigates a series of deaths linked to an exhibition of Egyptian antiquities, Constable Crabtree (Jonny Harris) is convinced a mummy's curse is to blame.
episodes.title: Evil Eye of Egypt

episodes.synopsis: While investigating an explosion, Detective Murdoch infiltrates an anarchist group lead by American labour organizer Emma Goldman.
episodes.title: War on Terror

episodes.synopsis: With the close assistance of opera-loving Inspector Brackenreid, Detective Murdoch investigates the murder of a young opera singer acting as the understudy for a tempestuous diva.
episodes.title: Murdoch at the Opera

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch suspects the ambitious inventor (Peter Stebbings) of an electric vehicle murdered an associate who stood in the way of his plans to compete with Henry Ford.
episodes.title: Who Killed the Electric Carriage

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch's investigation into the disappearance of a quiet librarian leads to a reunion with former love Anna Fulford and the discovery of a seamy underworld.
episodes.title: Stroll on the Wild Side: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After saving his lover Anna from the Black Hand, Detective Murdoch bargains for her life. During his investigation into a murder, he encounters a young woman behaving seductively.
episodes.title: Stroll on the Wild Side: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: After a ruthless inventor is killed at a convention, Murdoch's investigation is assisted by his idol, Alexander Graham Bell.
episodes.title: Invention Convention

episodes.synopsis: After a high stakes card game involving Dr. Grace ends with the death of a player, Murdoch is shocked to learn the true cost of their wagers is the opportunity to die.
episodes.title: Staircase to Heaven

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch is taunted by a deranged criminal who leaves talking dolls with macabre personal messages at each crime scene.
episodes.title: Murdoch in Toyland

episodes.synopsis: Toronto's hockey championship fortunes rest on Murdoch's shoulders when he investigates the death of the team captain.
episodes.title: Murdoch Night in Canada

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch investigates the claims of a man who says his time travels to the future provided him with information that allowed him to stop crimes.
episodes.title: Twentieth Century Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: When a flying machine crashes, killing a man on the ground, Murdoch's investigation uncovers high-level conspiracy and sabotage in the race to achieve the first human-controlled flight.
episodes.title: Murdoch Air

episodes.synopsis: After a veteran of a brutal North African battle is slain by a sword, Detective Murdoch's prime suspect is the victim's fellow soldier, who is none other than Winston Churchill.
episodes.title: Winston's Lost Night

episodes.synopsis: After a series of seemingly random murders, Murdoch rigs a film camera with a timer on a downtown street corner in order to capture the killer.
episodes.title: Murdoch on the Corner

episodes.synopsis: When Murdoch pursues a murderous gang of armed robbers, his prime suspect is a man claiming to be Sherlock Holmes.
episodes.title: A Study in Sherlock

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch enlists some revealing detective work while investigating a murder at a nudist community.
episodes.title: Au Naturel

episodes.synopsis: When an anonymous madman threatens the citizens of Toronto with a deadly toxic gas, Murdoch must race against the clock to stop him.
episodes.title: Murdoch and the Cloud of Doom

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the death of a politician, rumoured to have been killed by a vengeful ghost, Crabtree's theories of the paranormal conflict with Murdoch's scientific beliefs.
episodes.title: The Ghost of Queen's Park

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch investigates the murder of an Eaton's department store manager who was disliked by the shop girls.
episodes.title: Murdoch in Ladies Wear

episodes.synopsis: An uncooperative witness impedes Murdoch's investigation into a pawnbroker's murder, and Brackenreid faces resistance while looking into the prison death of an old army buddy.
episodes.title: Victoria Cross

episodes.synopsis: A series of violent drowning deaths of university-educated unmarried career women leads Murdoch to suspect sexist and racist motives.
episodes.title: Twisted Sisters

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch and Julia find themselves at odds when a delusional woman becomes the prime suspect in the violent stabbing of her gambling fiancé.
episodes.title: Lovers in a Murderous Time

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch and his methods are compromised when one of his colleagues is implicated in a suspicious murder.
episodes.title: Crime & Punishment

episodes.synopsis: With his colleague sentenced to hang for murder, Detective Murdoch races to exonerate them and steps into a trap set by the real killer.
episodes.title: The Murdoch Trap

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch investigates the disappearance of a ship magnate's daughter and the discovery of a body aboard a ship on its inaugural Victoria Day voyage.
episodes.title: Murdoch Ahoy

episodes.synopsis: When a competitor dies during a bicycle race, Murdoch suspects he was killed by large doses of a mysterious stimulant.
episodes.title: Tour de Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: After a man is shot in a movie house, Thomas Edison becomes a suspect and Murdoch is drawn into the drama of James Pendrick's filmmaking venture.
episodes.title: The Filmed Adventures of Detective William Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch's investigation into a nanny's disappearance is assisted by a man who considers himself to be the real Sherlock Holmes.
episodes.title: Return of Sherlock

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch's prime suspect in a woman's murder is her husband, who appears to have returned from the dead.
episodes.title: Murdoch of the Living Dead

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch investigates the death of one of Julia's phobia patients, but can Murdoch overcome his own fear to solve the case?
episodes.title: Murdochophobia

episodes.synopsis: A heat wave finds much of Toronto taking refuge at the beach, but when a body marked by a large bite washes ashore, rumors of a sea monster spread.
episodes.title: Loch Ness Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: A dead body and a piece of parchment lead Murdoch and Crabtree to follow a suspect named Jacob Doyle to his home in Newfoundland.
episodes.title: Republic of Murdoch

episodes.synopsis: Detective Murdoch accompanies convicted murderer James Gillies to his hanging.
episodes.title: Midnight Train to Kingston

episodes.synopsis: When the lead singer of a traveling ragtime group turns up dead, Murdoch looks to the group's complicated past for answers.
episodes.title: Murdoch in Ragtime

episodes.synopsis: Murdoch investigates a rash of tunneling robberies that Crabtree is convinced were perpetrated by a species of mole people.
episodes.title: Journey to the Centre of Toronto

episodes.synopsis: After a dying man confesses to a murder in what appears to be an open and shut case, Murdoch finds a body but suspects the real killer might be alive.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: When a suspect from Murdoch's past pulls a deadly con, he orchestrates an elaborate sting so she won't get away with murder again.
episodes.title: The Murdoch Sting

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Emily attend a bachelorette party on a secluded island. Murdoch and the boys from Station Four compete in a high-stakes curling match.
episodes.title: Friday the 13th, 1901

episodes.synopsis: The killing of U.S. President McKinley prompts a roundup of Canada's anarchists, landing Murdoch in a web of international espionage and intrigue.
episodes.title: The Spy Who Came Up to the Cold

episodes.synopsis: When a Chinese dignitary visiting Toronto is poisoned, Crabtree teams up with the prime suspect, whom he believes to be innocent.
episodes.title: Kung Fu Crabtree

episodes.synopsis: When an anti-progress zealot straps a bomb to a factory owner, Murdoch risks his own life to defuseit.
episodes.title: A Blast of Silence

episodes.synopsis: When Julia's father dies, she uncovers a truth behind his death. Brackenreid takes over the investigation of a murder among a group of geniuses.
episodes.title: The Death of Dr. Ogden
